info.name: Nayan Pawar
info.about: A Computer Engineering student skilled in full-stack development with strong interests in Artificial Intelligence, leadership, and management. Passionate about learning new technologies, leading teams, and building robust, scalable, and impactful software solutions.
info.careerGoals: To pursue a career in software engineering with a focus on innovation, AI-driven solutions, and problem-solving at scale.

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Computer Engineering

responsibilities: Researched and created technical content on AI/ML, Generative AI, and Cloud AI platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP, Databricks, NVIDIA).
Contributed to building AI copilots and intelligent agents for enterprise use cases and internal training.
Conducted guided research on Artificial General Intelligence (AGI) and documented findings.
Helped organize developer events and coding bootcamps including Flutter Roadshow Mumbai.
Assisted in planning and executing large-scale tech events with 150+ participants.
Created promotional content to increase engagement and social media reach.

projects.name: CensorPRO
projects.description: An AI-powered content moderation platform for text and images with role-based access control.

projects.name: EduAI
projects.description: An AI-driven learning path platform providing personalized resources, progress tracking, gamification, and community features.

projects.name: Attrition Forecast
projects.description: Attrition Forecast helps organizations predict employee turnover using advanced analytics and AI. Understand key factors driving attrition and take proactive steps to retain your top talent.

certifications: NISM – Wealth Creation and Securities Market
TCS iON Career Edge – Young Professional
